Package it.uniroma1.mdp.juno.model

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
it.uniroma1.mdp.juno.model.GameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class GameManager extends Observable implements Observer
This class implements various game mechanics such as card distributing, player turns and victory
Author:
Sebastiano Deodati
